page.title: 12CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: The children play various games in the playground. A popular game is Big A, Little A in which some people pretend to be cats and the rest mice. The mice creep up on the cats and say these words 'Big A,little A, bouncing B, the cat's in the cupboard and can't catch me.' Then the cats turn around and chase the mice. Whoever is caught joins the cats and the game continues until one mouse is left and the survivor becomes the first cat next time. Other games they like to play are: Stuck in the Mud, Grandmother's Footsteps, Black Cat, Red Letter, Buzz Off, and British Bulldog. They also play skipping games, hopscotch, netball, football and cricket.
